abstract: Shabab rebels in Somalia, armed with grenades, bazookas and suicide vests, attack an African Union peacekeeping base in Mogadishu, where government troops are also based.
snippet: Shabab rebels, armed with grenades, bazookas and suicide vests, attacked an African Union peacekeeping base in Mogadishu, Somalia, where government troops are also based.
lead_paragraph: Shabab rebels, armed with grenades, bazookas and suicide vests, attacked an African Union peacekeeping base in Mogadishu, Somalia, where government troops are also based.

headline.main: Militants Strike at Troops at Base in Somali Capital
headline.print_headline: Militants Strike at Troops At Base in Somali Capital
headline.seo: Shabab Rebels Attack Troops at Base in Somali Capital
